33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Imran bin Husain narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"In this Ummah there shall be collapsing of the earth, transformation and Qadhf." A man among the Muslims said: "O Messenger of Allah! When is that?" He said: "When singing slave-girls, music, and drinking intoxicants spread

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَلاَمَةِ حُلُولِ الْمَسْخِ وَالْخَسْفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Signs Of The Occurrence Of The Transformation And The Collapse Of The Earth
